    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x56
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 907x56 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 905x54
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 905x24
